quote: Imagine your contacts and your iMessage and FaceTime and your call logs and your email... with AI-powered suggestion prioritization.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the necessity of traditional CRMs with the advent of AI.
suggested_hook: Is AI about to make your CRM obsolete?

quote: Election years see higher appreciation rates for real estate than non-election years.
why_clipworthy: Provides a data-driven insight that can influence client decisions.
suggested_hook: Did you know election years could boost your home's value?
